articles.description: The summary discusses recent U.S. domestic news headlines, including Trump's legal attempts to dismiss a Georgia case against him and his controversial appointments to key government positions. articles.title: Democrats Want Republicans to Confirm Donald Trump Can't Serve Third Term
articles.description: The resolution addresses Trump's jokes about serving beyond two terms, which have raised concerns among Democrats.
articles.content:

articles.title: Trump asks Georgia court to toss election interference case after presidential win
